title: US to expel every last Iranian boot from Syria - Pompeo
content: Secretary of State Mike Pompeo said Barack Obama had made "dire misjudgements" in the Middle East.

title: Yemen soldiers killed in Houthi drone attack on base
content: Senior commanders who were watching a parade were reportedly injured in the Houthi rebel attack.

title: Yellow vests knock out 60% of all speed cameras in France
content: France's interior minister says protesters have rendered more than half of speed cameras useless.

title: Venezuela's Maduro begins second term
content: Nicolás Maduro is starting another six-year term as president, despite claims of vote-rigging.

title: South Africa teacher suspended over class 'split by race'
content: A viral photo showing children separated by race at a school in South Africa has sparked anger.

title: Russia media watchdog investigates BBC website over IS quotes
content: The Russian media regulator says it will review the BBC's output for compliance with its licence.

title: DR Congo presidential election: Church questions results
content: It is the first-ever opposition victory - but the Church, France and Belgium have expressed doubts.

title: South Africa sniffer dog intercepts 116kg of rhino horn
content: The haul, worth more than $1.3m (£1m), is one of the largest seized in South Africa in recent years.

title: Guantanamo death: US Navy Captain charged
content: John Nettleton is accused of concealing evidence after a civilian at the US base drowned in 2015.

title: Hang White People: Rapper Nick Conrad faces fine for YouTube song
content: French rapper Nick Conrad denies his music video, "Hang White People", was incitement to murder.

title: Giant gold coin trial opens in Berlin
content: Three men are accused of using a wheelbarrow to steal a huge coin worth £3.4m from a Berlin museum.

title: Heavy snow hits parts of Europe
content: Several people have died as heavy snow continues to cause disruption across parts of Europe.

title: Stricken inflatable boat faces cruise ship head on
content: Four passengers aboard an inflatable boat in a New Zealand harbour have a lucky escape.

title: Venlo WW2 explosive: Don't lie down on bombs, Dutch warned
content: The warning comes after a man covers a WW2 explosive device with his body for hours in Venlo.

title: Israeli mining company unearths rare mineral
content: A new mineral found in Israel has only previously been known to exist in outer space.

title: Brexit: EU in 'keep calm and carry on' mood
content: The EU prepares to implement the Brexit deal, regardless of the Westminster turmoil.

title: Signals from space: Five theories on what they are
content: Mysterious cosmic signals have been picked up. What are they and where do they come from?
